__TOC__

== gala.desrt.ca / gala.cas.mcmaster.ca ==

* Contact: RyanLortie (desrt)
* Make: Apple
* Model: Powerbook 1.3GHz/1GB/60G/Combo/8T/APX
* S/N: N/A

=== Current Issues ===

* Screen scrambled on wakeup: http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=13450
* Internal modem is not working (no free drivers).
* External DVI connector is not working (haven't investigated very deeply).
* Airport Extreme card is not working (no drivers at all).
* No 3D acceleration (free drivers are available, but not in Ubuntu).
* Backlight control isn't perfectly synchronised with LCD blanking.
* CVS Madwifi causes insomnia: http://lists.debian.org/debian-powerpc/2005/08/msg00074.html
